html > body > div:nth-child(41) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(41) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(3)
html > body > div:nth-child(41) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h4:nth-child(2)
